title: Contribute Your Time
description: Thank you for your interest in volunteering as a mentor, advisor, or contributor. Please fill out the form below.

fields.name: expertise
fields.label: Skills & Expertise
fields.placeholder: e.g., Software Development, Legal Research, Project Management

fields.name: availability
fields.label: Availability
fields.placeholder: e.g., 5 hours per week, available on weekends

title: Contribute Problems
description: Help us identify legal challenges that need technological solutions. Please describe the problem below.

fields.name: problemArea
fields.label: Area of Law / Jurisdiction
fields.placeholder: e.g., Family Law in Kenya, Tenancy disputes in Berlin

fields.name: description
fields.label: Problem Description
fields.placeholder: Describe the challenge in detail. Who is affected? What are the current obstacles?

title: Contribute Ideas
description: Thank you for your interest in sharing innovative solutions. Please fill out the form below to contribute.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Idea Title
fields.placeholder: e.g., AI-Powered Legal Assistant for Refugees

fields.name: description
fields.label: Idea Description
fields.placeholder: Describe your idea in detail. What problem does it solve? Who does it help?

title: Contribute Connections
description: Introduce us to key stakeholders in the legal tech ecosystem. Please provide their details below.

fields.name: reason
fields.label: Reason for Connection
fields.placeholder: Briefly explain why you think we should connect.
